נוט נגן שלט מקלדת Navigate using up, down, right and left. Make a selection using Play/Pause. Go back to the previous screen using MENU. Navigate using the arrow keys. Make a selection using the Enter key. Use "\" to toggle between full screen and window. Exit or Suspend by clicking S. Click Esc to go back to the previous screen. Go to the home screen by clicking H. Control volume level using +/- Show the OSD and make selections using Play/Pause. Skip using the back and forwards buttons. Hide the OSD using MENU. Show the OSD and make selections using Enter. Click X to stop playback. Play / Pause using the Space bar. Skip using the right/left arrow keys. Hide the OSD by clicking Esc. This is just a basic list of keyboard shortcuts. For the complete list, check out our FAQ on http://www.boxee.tv
